arts.ttl: Newcastle United XI vs West Ham United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Newcastle United travel to the London Stadium on Sunday full of confidence. They will be aiming to continue their dominance in this particular fixture. The Magpies are unbeaten in their last six visits to West Ham’s home ground. Furthermore, they arrive having won four of their last five games in all competitions. arts.ttl: West Ham United vs Newcastle United – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: West Ham United are in a desperate search for their first home win of the season as they prepare to host an in-form Newcastle United at the London Stadium on Sunday. The Hammers sit 19th in the Premier League table. arts.ttl: West Ham United vs Newcastle United – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: West Ham United host Newcastle United on Sunday. This has become a critical match for new manager Nuno Espírito Santo. The Hammers are in dire form. They are currently winless in their last six league games and rooted in the relegation zone. Consequently, pressure is mounting on the Portuguese coach.
